content:
On Simplifier I see limited cardinalities for NL-core:
identifier (BSN) ..1
This makes it guesswork what the missing value is. Often min missing, sometimes max, often both. Is this a feature, a bug in Simplifier or a bug in NL-core?

@Marc de Graauw That's because we have uploaded a differential. You only see the changes. We are currently working on integrating the snapshot generator. And improved rendering so you can switch between the two.
